== Desktop Bugs ==

The Ubuntu Desktop unfortunately '''has''' bugs. This is how we cope with them.

=== How to Triage ===

Are you new to bug triage? Most frequent questions have already been answered <nowiki>[[Bugs|here]]</nowiki>.

You may also be interested in some useful <nowiki>[[DebuggingProcedures|debugging tips]]</nowiki> to get more information about a problem.

If you really want to get started, you have read the above documents, and you still feel like "What am I supposed to do?" Don't worry, that's how we all felt when we started.

=== Opportunities ===

* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/desktop-bugs/+assignedbugs?field.searchtext=&orderby=-importance&field.status%3Alist=New&field.status%3Alist=Incomplete&field.status%3Alist=Confirmed&field.status%3Alist=Triaged&field.status%3Alist=In+Progress&field.status%3Alist=Fix+Committed&field.owner=&field.status_upstream=pending_bugwatch&field.status_upstream-empty-marker=1&field.omit_dupes.used=&field.omit_dupes=on&field.has_patch.used=&search=Search|Bugs that should be filed upstream]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~desktop-bugs/+assignedbugs?field.searchtext=&orderby=date_last_updated&search=Search&field.status%3Alist=New&field.status%3Alist=Confirmed&field.status%3Alist=Triaged&field.status%3Alist=In+Progress&field.status%3Alist=Incomplete&field.status%3Alist=Fix+Committed&field.assignee=&field.owner=&field.omit_dupes=on&field.has_patch=&field.has_no_package=|Bugs that haven't been touched in a while]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/~desktop-bugs/+assignedbugs?field.searchtext=&orderby=datecreated&field.status%3Alist=New&field.bug_reporter=&field.bug_contact=&field.status_upstream-empty-marker=1&field.omit_dupes.used=&field.omit_dupes=on&field.has_patch.used=&field.tag=&field.has_cve.used=&search=Search|Old bugs with 'New' status]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/~desktop-bugs/+assignedbugs?field.searchtext=&orderby=datecreated&search=Search&field.status%3Alist=Incomplete&field.bug_reporter=&field.bug_contact=&field.status_upstream-empty-marker=1&field.omit_dupes.used=&field.omit_dupes=on&field.has_patch.used=&field.tag=&field.has_cve.used=|Old bugs with 'Incomplete' status]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://harvest.ubuntu.com/opportunities/?pkg.set=ubuntu-desktop&opp.list=patches|Bugs with patches attached]]</nowiki> (it'd be nice if you could either comment or test them to make inclusion easier)
